Biden to witness return of remains of US soldiers killed in JordanWith U.S. President Joe Biden bearing witness, the remains of three American soldiers killed in an attack by an Iranian-made drone in Jordan will arrive back in the United States on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 06:02:35 GMT NZ66GABR7RLG7F4GIYLDUHOUSE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-witness-returns-remains-us-soldiers-killed-jordan-2024-02-02/Jeff Mason世界美国
Turkey arrests 25 suspects over church shooting - ministerTurkish authorities have formally arrested 25 suspects in connection with the shooting of a man during a service at a church in Istanbul last weekend, Justice Minister Yilmaz Tunc said on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 05:42:03 GMT UJMH6HXMX5NZ7ASMBLAHK5OJNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-arrest-25-suspects-over-church-shooting-minister-2024-02-02/Reuters世界中东地区
'Open warfare': Philippines' Marcos-Duterte alliance crumblesThe alliance between Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr and his predecessor Rodrigo Duterte disintegrated this week when they accused each other of using drugs - a rift that could threaten Marcos's reform agenda and risk fuelling instability. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 05:32:07 GMT C2TJ7NRA7RNZRLVC66R7ZGNFD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/open-warfare-philippines-marcos-duterte-alliance-crumbles-2024-02-02/Karen Lema世界亚太地区
Indonesia's presidential contenders promise tax reform to boost revenueThe three main candidates contesting Indonesia's presidential elections this month are proposing to bolster government coffers by creating a new tax collection agency, despite scepticism from the tax and business community. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 05:14:48 GMT 4JOTLQTHGJJZ5CZCMND2QGQ7TU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-presidential-contenders-promise-tax-reform-b​​oost-revenue-2024-02-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Saudi Arabia pushes for U.S. defence pact ahead of presidential electionSaudi Arabia would be willing to accept a political commitment from Israel to create a Palestinian state, rather than anything more binding, in a bid to get a defence pact with Washington approved before the U.S. presidential election, three sources said. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 05:02:51 GMT M4I3OG2YGZPMVD3CCJTDEZBXTI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/saudi-arabia-pushes-us-defence-pact-ahead-presidential-election-2024-02-02/Samia Nakhoul, Dan Williams, Matt Spetalnick世界中东地区
Protests expected over NZ indigenous policies on national day holidayCrowds at this weekend's anniversary of New Zealand’s founding document signing in the town of Waitangi are expected be their biggest in 30 years as indigenous Maori plan to discuss and protest proposed policies that some say will disadvantage them. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 04:27:56 GMT RF2LFDV6GNJJ3G54OD7FZ6KD™ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/protests-expected-over-nz-indigenous-policies-national-day-holiday-2024-02-02/Lucy Craymer世界亚太地区
North Korea fires cruise missiles off west coast -SeoulNorth Korea fired multiple cruise missiles off its west coast on Friday, South Korea's military said, marking the fourth time in just over a week that Pyongyang has launched such missiles off both coasts. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 04:17:12 GMT GHRD6BZVXFOO7KYMQFVVSWJXYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-fires-multiple-cruise-missiles-south-korea-2024-02-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ahead of election, Pakistan seals plan to sell national airlineAhead of elections next week, Pakistan's caretaker administration is making binding plans for a new government to sell loss-making Pakistan International Airlines , according to the minister in charge of the process and other officials. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 03:31:03 GMT AGCTS75H3JPTNCQ2SL47FLIBAY https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/ahead-election-pakistan-seals-plan-sell-national-airline-2024-02-02/Asif Shahzad商业航空航天与国防
Trudeau condemns mosque attack, says Islamophobia 'has no place' in CanadaCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Thursday condemned an attack against a mosque in the city of Mississauga in Ontario province, which is being probed as a hate crime and which rights advocates described as being part of a rise in Islamophobia. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 03:15:21 GMT KJ2A3ZSVB5NE7K2WZW6GWGEO5I https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/trudeau-condemns-mosque-attack-says-islamophobia-has-no-place-canada-2024-02-02/Kanishka Singh世界美洲
Four weeks after sailing for Israel, 16,000 sheep and cattle remain in limbo aboard shipAround 16,000 livestock remained in limbo aboard an export ship at an Australian port on Friday, having set sail for Israel exactly four weeks ago only to abandon a passage through the Red Sea and be ordered home by the Australian government. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 03:05:53 GMT G7SWCGXI3BIYHFEK6KGMMLDFCA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/four-weeks-after-sailing-israel-16000-sheep-cattle-remain-limbo-aboard-ship-2024-02-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Indonesia's Jokowi insists 'no problem' in cabinet amid rumbles of discontentIndonesia President Joko Widodo on Friday insisted his cabinet was working normally, amid reports of discontent among his top officials and long-running speculation of a planned resignation by his widely respected finance minister. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 02:57:16 GMT RI742QMDP5PF3ODXABJUR2XYZE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-president-says-cabinet-working-normally-amid-reports-of-discontent-2024-02-02/Ananda Teresia, Stanley Widianto世界亚太地区
